episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Podcast 573
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee chats with the Vegan Black Metal Chef about metal vegans and his new cookbook The Seitanic Spellbook. Dee and comedian Matt Kirshen discuss the rivalry between comedians and magicians, racist toys, and a man killed by his porn collection. Phone calls. Buy a copy of The Seitanic Spellbook Check out Matt Kirshen’s podcast Probably […]

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 572
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: In this week’s special extended episode, Dee Simon and guest hosts comedian Kyle Kinane and Serge from Samiam chat about rockstars playing gay chicken onstage, the chiropractor who solved the menstruation problem, female mormon ninja assassins, and the reason you should treat fast food workers with respect. Phone calls. Check out kylekinane.com for upcoming shows.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 571
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and special guest hosts Serge and Rustee chat about sex trafficking, father-son pedophiles, fembots assassinating a dictator’s son, and a resourceful German murderess. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 570
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee Simon and special guest hosts Aussie Tyler and Casey discuss their Valentine’s Day plans. Bob Kraft wants his Superbowl ring back. Hitler Valentine at Central Michigan University. Never buy a display bed at a furniture store. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 569
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee didn’t get an invite to Harrison’s Super Bowl party. Harrison has a major announcement. Steele rants about the Women’s March, Refugees, and the SAG Awards in Fistful of Steele. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 568
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison think this new breed of Internet Hipster Nazis deserve more than a punch to the face. Scientists ignore laws of nature and create a Pigman. Disgruntled teen enjoys stabbing strangers. Florida Cop stages the worst suicide of all time. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 567
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee supported women by attending Women’s March Los Angeles while Harrison supported women by taking drugs and watching Pornhub for five hours. Dee and Harrison chat with former gay prostitute Patrick about the demise of backpage.com. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 566
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Name one thing the President Elect and R Kelly have in common. Pervert scientists film monkey deer sex scene. Grilled Cheese leads to sexual assault in Wisconsin. And the World’s Most Psychotic Wife Award goes to Angela Diaz. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 565
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee suspects Harrison may be a dangle for the Russians. How badly do you want to go to Coachella? Sorry Nazis, They Live is not about the Jews. Another semen squirter at the Walmart. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 563
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Harrison has a bad case of the zaps. It’s never not creepy to try and pickup a girl while taking UberPool. Chachi beaten up by the Red Hot Chili Pepper’s drummer’s wife. Jewish molester comes up with a creative excuse. Coupon rage at local supermarket. What’s your suicide song? Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 562
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison want to spread their own fake news involving Nancy Reagan, Chuck E Cheese, and Aleister Crowley. Aussie Man punches kangaroo to get Fosters back. Rampant acts of duggery in Stockton. Walgreens bathroom claims another life. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 561
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Harrison might be the worst Santa in Pasadena. Fidel Castro wasn’t fond of exploding cigars. Steele rants about Black Santa, overweight Barbie, and Autism in Fistful of Steele. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 560
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Cuckolding is the new Thanksgiving tradition. Tila Tequila is the new leader of the Alt Right. Angry husband wants wife to learn chess. Horny pensioner pulls a super moon. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 559
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison chat with musician and fellow podcaster Doc Coyle about his new show The Ex Man Podcast. Harrison is the real Bad Santa. Ohio lawyer who ‘hypnotized women’ charged with rape. Oregon man takes an acid bath at Yellowstone. Vince Neal will not be playing at Trump’s inauguration. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 558
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison try to accept the horrifying reality of President Donald Trump. Swede offers marriage to Americans fleeing Trump. Minnesota bar’s “Smack Fest” turns ugly. Serial killer posts hilarious Amazon reviews. Phone calls. Leonard Cohen RIP.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 557
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison wish they could visit Orgy Island. Hillary Clinton and her Satanic Dinner Parties. Special Election Edition of Fistful of Steele. Phone Calls. Get out and vote!

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 556
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison think Donald Trump should play Moon Man at his rallies. Trump’s star on Hollywood Walk of Fame vandalized. New cosmetic surgery trend in Hollywood. Breaking Bad themed Grindr date. Phone calls. Happy Halloween!

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 555
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and special guest Penthouse Pet Ryan Keely want everyone to vote NO on Prop 60. Interview with Justin Fix, founder and creator of http://www.creepla.com/ Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 554
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Wikileaks founder Julian Assange reveals emails from the Blink 182 guy briefing Hillary Clinton about aliens. Who are we to judge Ken Bone? Man on LSD ‘saves’ dog from house fire. Aussie Dream Team plans the perfect murder. Phone calls.

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: After the second debate, Dee and Harrison come to the realization that we’re all doomed. Steele gets political in Fistful of Steele. Phone calls.

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee, Harrison, and guest host Rustee chat about the new Amanda Knox documentary. Never throw a pie in the face of a former NBA player. Massive drug bust at the Burger King. Poorly planned preemptive revenge porn strike. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 551
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison take bets on who turns out to be the king of the Hollywood pedophile ring. How does Donald Trump prepare for a debate? A potty-mouthed high school teacher in Ontario. Cup of semen at Panera. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 550
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Harrison has more secrets than Hillary Clinton. Senior citizen punched out by deplorable at Trump rally. The saga of the Bar Mitzvah Blowjob Lady. Juggalo blood ritual in Wisconsin. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 549
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Since Harrison is MIA, Dee and guest hosts Richard and Rustee chat about parachutes and prostitutes. Mother, Daughter Incest in Oklahoma. Five day old baby punched in the head in Manchester. Rapist tries to use the ol’ big dick defense. Phone calls.

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison mourn the death of Gawker. Racist Anonymous meetings in North Carolina. Extreme father-daughter bonding in New Zealand. Bug nightmare on crowded NYC subway train. Phone calls.

Bath salts cause Florida frat boy to become cannibal. Phone calls. Get your dick pic critiqued by Madeleine: http://critiquemydickpic.tumblr.com/

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 545
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Harrison spends birthday eating lobster and trying not to kill himself. Dee Simon is now a two cat guy. Brendan Dassey’s conviction overturned. Burger King gets creative with its new menu items. Fight in theater after Suicide Squad more entertaining than movie. Japanese poop ghost pursues Chinese mistress. Phone calls.

Indianapolis Rapper makes the most asinine attempt at a viral video of all time. Florida dad fatally injures ‘Pinky’ the dancing flamingo. Phone calls.

episodes.summary: Since the DNC was too boring to talk about, Dee and Harrison discuss the release of would-be Reagan assassin, John Hinckley Jr. We discover that John Steele’s favorite Pokemon is the Squirtle in Fistful of Steele. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 542
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft

John Steele rants about Brexit, Terrorism, the Village People, and rape prevention in Fistful of Steele. Phone calls. RIP Bernie Worrell. episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft

episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison wish they could choose their own Frankenpenis. Louisiana lawmaker proposes weight limit for strippers. Who wouldn’t get breast implants for $100k? Newark woman can’t handle her high. Smashmouth shirt causes chaos in Phoenix. Phone calls.

Phone calls.

Sneaker heist in Brooklyn goes awry. Never visit a gynecologist that looks like Gary Coleman. Phone calls.

episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison think that Bill Gates’ master plan is to use the Zika virus to create an army of microcephalics. Dee has a rare occurrence at work. Staten Island armless man mugged for iPhone. Chinese prostitute stuck with a client. Phone calls.

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft

episodes.summary: Dee thinks Harrison should record ASMR porn videos to make some extra money. Harrison shares some David Bowie stories. Gang rape in Brooklyn has some weird twists. ER doctor likes to gives his patients facials. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 514
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: The only reason to play the lotto is hookers and cocaine. The Playboy Mansion is for sale with one tiny catch. Walmart Proposal in Bay City. Northern California bro takes friendship way too seriously. Phone calls.

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison are glad 2015 is over but gutted that it had to end with the death of Ian “Lemmy” Kilmister. Saudi Billionaire uses the Bill Cosby Defense. Knives and Hallucinogens do not make good bedfellows. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 512.2

episodes.summary: Part 2 of the Sick and Wrong Holiday Show Spectacular with special guests Lance Wackerle and John Steele. Happy New Year!

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 512.1
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Part 1 of the S&W Holiday Show Spectacular with special guest Lenora Claire. Why can’t they just stop doing Santa Con? Lenora chats about her experience with a violent celebrity stalker. The most depressing Christmas songs of all time. Merry Christmas!

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 511
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee and Harrison speak to porn actress Nicki Blue about her experience working with James Deen. Squirrel terrorist. Road head gone awry in Florida. is Harrison the Freak of the week? Phone calls. Follow Nicki Blue on Twitter: https://twitter.com/nickiblue

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 510
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: Dee shares some humiliating stories from his UK Sick and Wrong tour. More mass shootings in the US than days of the year in 2015. Mansion owner duped into gay porn rental. Dentist trades root canals for meth and child porn. Phone calls.

episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 508
episodes.author: Dee Simon and Harrison P. Lovecraft
episodes.summary: While Dee’s off touring Europe, Harrison gets a job and learns how to ride a rap scooter. Fistful of Thanksgiving with John Steele. Phone calls. Meet up with Dee in Dublin, Glasgow, and London. Check the SW Facebook page for details.

Jeb Bush wishes he was a time-traveling baby killer. New Mexico man squirts children with homemade semensoaker. English writer does not take criticism very well. Phone calls.

Supportive girlfriend helps boyfriend commit suicide. Florida woman hires hitman because her grandkids got lice. Dee and Lance have a MAJOR Announcement.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 487

episodes.summary: Dee and Lance acknowledge that a female UFC fighter would kick their asses in less than thirty seconds. Romantic horse rapist in Texas. Annoying female archetype helps prisoners escape. Phone calls.

episodes.summary: If you organize a naked event, you should expect a boner or two. Never masturbate in a portable toilet with the door open. DIY family abortion in Texas. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 483

episodes.summary: Dee and Lance speculate on how many shots a bartender would serve a customer before cutting them off. Dead skin shaving milkshake in Maryland. Jealous girlfriend slashes corpse in Oklahoma. Phone calls.

episodes.title: Sick and Wrong Episode 482

episodes.summary: How many sex offenders live in your neighborhood? Dee and Lance chat with Chris Hansen about his new webseries, Hansen vs Predator. Phone calls. Donate to Chris Hansen’s Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1606694156/hansen-vs-predator
